WhoWeAre.title: Who we are
WhoWeAre.subtitle: We are perfect for home interior doors
WhoWeAre.description: At Kamelia Doors, we take pride in crafting the perfect doors to complement your home's interior. With a focus on quality, precision, and durability, our expert craftsmen ensure that every door is tailored to meet the highest standards. Whether you're looking to add a touch of elegance or a modern flair to your space, Kamelia Doors provides solutions that not only enhance the beauty of your home but also offer lasting value. Discover the art of fine interior doors with us.

CustomizedDoors.subtitle: customized doors
CustomizedDoors.title: get your desired door designs
CustomizedDoors.description: Experience the freedom to design your ideal door with our custom solutions at Kamelia Doors. Whether you envision a sleek, modern style or a classic, timeless look, we bring your ideas to life with precision and care. Our range of customizable options allows you to choose the perfect finish, material, and design that matches your unique taste and home's aesthetic. Elevate your space with doors that are not only functional but also a true reflection of your personal style.

DifferentWood.wood_description: Explore a rich palette of wood colors, each carefully selected to enhance the natural beauty of your doors and complement your interior design.

AppointmentAboutUs.appointment_description: Ready to take the next step in creating your perfect door? Book an appointment with our expert to get precise measurements taken right at your location. Our specialist will guide you through the process, ensuring that every detail is accounted for, from the dimensions to the design preferences, so you can achieve the exact look and fit you desire for your home.
AppointmentAboutUs.kamelia_description_1: Kamelia Doors is a company specializing in the manufacturing of custom interior doors according to precise specifications and measurements. Our production facility, covering over 6,500 square meters, is equipped with a comprehensive production line that meets your needs for both speed and quality.
AppointmentAboutUs.kamelia_description_2: We offer a wide range of doors in various styles and designs to satisfy diverse customer requirements, including interior doors, exterior doors, security doors, glass doors, and more.

GetInTouch.get_in_touch_description: Need a custom quote or have questions? Fill out the form, and our team will get back to you quickly. We're here to help bring your vision to life.

Additionalinfo.material_options: Material Options: Solid wood, engineered wood, MDF, and glass.
Additionalinfo.finish_choices: Finish Choices: Matte, semi-gloss, high-gloss, and custom stains.
Additionalinfo.available_sizes: Available Sizes: Standard and custom dimensions to fit any space.
Additionalinfo.hardware: Hardware: Includes a selection of handles, hinges, and locks.
Additionalinfo.customization: Customization: Personalized designs, engravings, and panel styles.
